DataElement.preferredName: Patient Plan Therapeutic Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator related to planned therapy for a patient necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Plan Therapeutic Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to planned therapy for a patient necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial. Â

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Plan Therapeutic Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Planned; devised, contrived, or formed in design.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.:Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: To devise, contrive, or form in design.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to COG for by script Thu Jan 2 10:00:57 EST 2014

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does patient's planned therap
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient's planned therapy include removal of uterus or ovaries, pelvic irradiation, cranial irradiation, or hematopoietic stem cell transplantation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: EAI142 Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient is a premenopausal woman, postmenopausal woman, or man for whom endocrine therapy (tamoxifen, aromatase inhibitor [AI], with or without ovarian suppression or fulvestrant), with or without a CDK4/6 inhibitor, is planned after FES-PET/CT is completed

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have planned focal, cranial or craniospinal radiation treatment for a primary brain tumor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Have planned surgery or radiation treatment during the course of the study (hormonal and biologic therapy is allowed).
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have planned surgery or radiation treatment during the course of the study (hormonal and biologic therapy is allowed).

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is treatment planned for all metastatic disease with definitive therapy including either surgery,ablative doses of radiation,or intervention of some type to ALL metastatic sites per 3.2.1

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Will patient receive a BFM, COG, or C10403-based induction regimen inclusive of greater than or equal to 1 dose of pegaspargase or calaspargase pegol?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have planned allogeneic HCT (bone marrow, peripheral blood stem cell, or cord blood transplant)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: URCC22063
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have any planned major surgeries within the next 3 months.
